charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1101_0100_2:
While [Name:PlayerNickname ] was out on a
hike in the mountains, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] spotted Steven
and Grimsley having a conversation.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_0200_1:
That was an interesting contest. As promised, the
stone is yours.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_0300_1:
I’m looking forward to the day we match
wits again.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_0401_0600_1:
I most certainly did. It wasn’t a Pokémon battle,
though.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_0402_0800_1: That’s because she hit the jackpot.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_0900_1:
Here’s what happened. While we were walking,
Bisharp came across a stone that’s perfect for
sharpening her blades...
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_1000_1:
but at the same time, Steven spotted the stone
and decided that he wanted it as well.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_1100_1: I guess to him, it was some sort of rare stone.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_1200_1:
So I proposed settling the matter like gentlemen...
With a bet.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_1300_1: It was a very simple bet.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_1400_1:
Who would be the next to walk by us on the road,
a boy or a girl?
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_1500_1:
Steven said that it would be a boy, and Bisharp
thought it would be a girl. And just like that, we
had a bet.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_1600_1: Mere moments later, a male Trainer walked by.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_0401_1800_1: No. You see, there was one small problem.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_0402_2000_1: That’s right. It was a male Trainer.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_2100_1:
I was just about to shake Steven’s hand and
congratulate him on winning the bet when Bisharp
stopped me.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_2200_1:
That took me by surprise, because Bisharp isn’t the
type of Pokémon to break her promises.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_2300_1:
I knew there had to be some reason why she
stopped me.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_2400_1:
Just then, I noticed something. The Trainer
had a partner Pokémon—a Pawniard. And not
only that...
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_2500_1:
but the Pawniard was actually walking in front
of the Trainer.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_2600_1:
Sure enough, I asked the Trainer whether his
Pawniard was male or female, and it turned
out she was a girl!
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_0401_2800_1: Yeah. I have to admit, I was amused as well.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_3100_1:
You really can’t tell just from a Pawniard’s
appearance alone, but Bisharp noticed right away.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_3200_1:
I know my Bisharp very well, but every now and
then, she surprises me.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_3300_1: That’s why I adore her so much.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_0401_3500_1: Bisharp and I go way back.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_0401_3600_1:
That’s why I almost always know what
she’s thinking.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_0402_3800_1: That’s right. We’ve been partners for ages.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_3900_1:
When we battle, Bisharp often goes into motion
before I’ve even given her a command, because
she knows what I’m going to say.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_4000_1:
I guess after spending so much time around a
risk taker like me, she’s gotten pretty good at
reading people.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_4100_1:
I can’t say for sure if she really understands my
every thought.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_4200_1:
But I know I’ve always got her back—and she’s
always got mine.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_4300_1:
Well, would you look at that? She’s itching to put
her freshly sharpened blades to the test.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_4400_1:
What do you say, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Care for a battle?
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_4500_1:
When it comes to surprises, you definitely are full
of them.
charaepi_ch0048_80_gima/2301_1201_4600_1:
A battle between wild cards like you and me is
certain to be a thrill.
